name: Data Calculations
func:
let interval = global.get('interval'); //time in minutes
let startHour = parseInt(global.get('startTime')); //military time integer
let endHour = parseInt(global.get('endTime'));//military time integer
let weekDays = 5; // 1-7
let frameSize = global.get('fileSize'); //Frame size in Mb
let dailyHours = endHour - startHour;
let cameras = 2; //number of cameras

let dailyFrames = (dailyHours*60)/interval;
let monthlyFrames = (dailyFrames*weekDays)*4

let dailyDownload = (dailyFrames*frameSize)/1024; //Size in Gb
let weeklyDownload = (dailyFrames*weekDays)*frameSize/1024; //Size in Gb
let monthlyDownload = (monthlyFrames*frameSize)/1024; //Size in Gb

msg.payload = {

    DailyFrames: dailyFrames,
    MonthlyFrames: monthlyFrames,
    DailyDownload_Gb: parseFloat(dailyDownload.toFixed(1)),
    WeeklyDownload_Gb: parseFloat(weeklyDownload.toFixed(1)),
    MonthlyDownload_Gb: parseFloat(monthlyDownload.toFixed(1)),

}
return msg;
